issue.title: [Rust] IPC reader must respect continuation markers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8225](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8225). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A continuation marker (value of 0xffffffff) in a message size block is
 used to align the next block to an 8-byte boundary. This value needs to
 be skipped over if encountered.
